column4: Hi everybody! Is it possible to have an equalizer for the whole system sound?
I havent found one yet
although a couple weeks ago i did see one somewhere and forgo to save the link :(
let me check again hold on
I believe it is a pulseaudio system wide equalizer
http://www.webupd8.org/2010/09/download-pulseaudio-system-wide.html
tks a lot! by now I tried to use jack but i'm unable to connect system's audio to jack...
ah  was there an error?
no, simply no audio
it seems jack accepts only analog inputs by system... but maybe i'm unable to configure...
I am not up to top skill level with audio issues...have you checked in  #pulseaudio or #alsa channels?
let me see if there is a jack channel
not yet, I was searching for a jack channel...
/join #jack
tks!!
just installed pulseeq, but where is it now?
not sure hold on let me check
found
ok
works!!! system audio is automatically redirected through!!! i'm on ubuntu 10.10, I have to learn the new audio system...
very cool
a little bit of issues... when I start and application (amarok, vlc...) using the eq, volume goes to 100%...
ah ok ..that part you may have to deal with in #pulseaudio
